name: Lorenzo's Well
description:
Lorenzo has fallen down a well and can't get out. Good thing he won't give up easy. There might be a way up deeper down. But you won't know until you try. 

While you  will    not face an immediate threat,  the game can be unsettling at times. Lorenzo's well will require persistence and a little courage.    Secrets may lie around any corner. So keep your eyes open for faint signs of discovery. Who knows what kinds of things may be hiding underground.

This short experience was made out of a passion for the craft of game design.  And it may be the first of a larger catalogue of adventures. While not technically impressive, the hope is for players to find an adventure worth undertaking.
